name: Attach3DTextLabelToPlayer
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3a and will not work in earlier versions!
description: Attach a 3D text label to a player.

params_body.name: Text3D:id
params_body.description: The ID of the 3D text label to attach. Returned by Create3DTextLabel.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player to attach the label to.

params_body.name: OffsetX
params_body.description: The X offset from the player.

params_body.name: OffsetY
params_body.description: The Y offset from the player.

params_body.name: OffsetZ
params_body.description: The Z offset from the player.

return_values:
1: The function executed successfully. 

 0: The function failed to execute. This means the player and/or label do not exist.
related_fn:
